db:abstract.db:para: Allows fonts to be loaded by name or URL.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The FontLoader type is used to load fonts by name or URL.
The status indicates when the font has been loaded, which is useful for fonts loaded from remote sources.

db:section.db:title: name : string
db:section.db:para: This property holds the name of the font family. It is set automatically when a font is loaded using the url property.
Use this to set the font.family property of a Text item.

db:section.db:title: source : url
db:section.db:para: The url of the font to load.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] status : enumeration
db:section.db:para: This property holds the status of font loading. It can be one of:

db:listitem.db:para: FontLoader.Null - no font has been set
FontLoader.Ready - the font has been loaded
FontLoader.Loading - the font is currently being loaded
FontLoader.Error - an error occurred while loading the font
